pr_title: Improve hdfs version test to parse CDH version

timeline.author: madanadit
timeline.diffHunk:

+  private static Pattern sHadoopPattern =

timeline.bodyText: @madanadit Do we want to consider HDP?
timeline.author: jiacheliu3
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -31,6 +31,20 @@
 public class HdfsVersionValidationTask extends AbstractValidationTask {
   private final AlluxioConfiguration mConf;
 
+  // An example output from "hadoop version" command:
+  //    Hadoop 2.7.2
+  //    Subversion https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf/hadoop.git
+  //      -r b165c4fe8a74265c792ce23f546c64604acf0e41
+  //    Compiled by jenkins on 2016-01-26T00:08Z
+  //    Compiled with protoc 2.5.0
+  //    From source with checksum d0fda26633fa762bff87ec759ebe689c
+  //    This command was run using /tmp/hadoop/share/hadoop/common/hadoop-common-2.7.2.jar
+  private static Pattern sHadoopPattern =
+          Pattern.compile("Hadoop\\s+(?<version>([0-9]\\.)+[0-9]+)");
+  // An example Hadoop version for CDH distribution is
+  // Hadoop 2.6.0-cdh5.16.2
+  private static Pattern sCdhPattern = Pattern.compile("cdh(?<cdhVersion>([0-9]+\\.)+[0-9]+)");

timeline.bodyText: @jiacheliu3 same for sCdhPattern and change capitalization to HADOOP_PATTERN
timeline.author: madanadit
